attributes.action: Give Students (12-16) A Choice To Dropout Of School To Start/Do Their Company.
attributes.additional_details:
The question you should ask yourself today: Young people can bring more innovative ideas, they think outside the box and if they have a business like brain, they can change the world or even solve major issues (poverty), the government wants to be richer by more and more taxes, surely they should want businesses to enrich Britain even more, so by adding your signature you're turning Britain back to Great business Britain.

Thank you
Rees Southern
Owner & CEO at Super Travel Bookings.
attributes.background: My personal story: I'm nearly 14 years of age and own a "what I think" successful online travel agency, which at its peak was worth £400,000, and I wasn't allowed to drop out to grow it into a million pound company, now that worth has dropped dramatically, now depression has taken over.
